ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-14 12:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-14 12:10:00
Category III for 35-year-old male. Sports injury to right knee.
Age 35. Isolated knee ligament injury. No osseous injury.
BP 120/76, HR 70, RR 14, GCS 15.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-14 12:30:00
Right knee x-ray: no acute osseous abnormality.
MRI right knee: ACL tear. No other findings.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-14 13:00:00
Isolated ACL injury. Knee immobilizer applied.
Outpatient referral to sports medicine. Discharged.
